Headline: Brown Line Delays
ShortDescription: Brown Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Damen. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line trains are running w ith significant delays following an earlier mechanical problem on a train near Damen.

  • Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting sservice between Kimball and Belmont in both directions.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #91 Austin Temporary Reroute at Austin/Cortland
ShortDescription: 91 Austin buses are  rerouted in both directions via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue and Austin due to police activity near Austin/Cortland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#91 Austin buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Austin, Grand, Central, North Avenue, then resume their normal route on Austin due to police activity near Austin/Cortland.

Allow extra travel time.
